location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires at the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: This letter concerns the payment of Mirza Ali Ackbar's salary for December 1822. Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, refers to Henry Willock's letter of 31 December 1823 and requests that Willock send him an extract from the account of the Mission's expenses for the year 1822. Stannus states that a certifed extract is required to enable him to recover the amount from Captain William Bruce, should it appear that any mistake has occurred in the transaction.
